alert.note: Alert for Chowan; Gates; Pasquotank; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 6:53PM EDT until July 24 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN PASQUOTANK...NORTHWESTERN PERQUIMANS...SOUTHEASTERN GATES AND NORTHWESTERN CHOWAN COUNTIES... At 653 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sunbury to Hobbsville to near Harrellsville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Hobbsville around 700 PM EDT. Ryland around 720 PM EDT. Tyner around 725 PM EDT. Belvidere around 740 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Gliden, Lynchs Corner, Acorn Hill, Peach, Whiteston, Parkville, Nicanor, Carter, Icaria and Smithtown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
